typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Patient Name} as string,
		{Patient DOB} as string,
		Facility as string,
		Physician as string,
		{Service date} as string,
		{ICD10 codes} as string,
		{Billing codes} as string,
		Encounter as string,
		Billed as string,
		Coded as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		Provider as string,
		Charges as string,
		Payments as string,
		Adjustments as string,
		Units as string,
		{Net Effect} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		patientname = {Patient Name},
		facility = Facility,
		clinician = Physician,
		ICD10 = {ICD10 codes},
		billingcodes = {Billing codes},
		encounterid = Encounter,
		billed = Billed,
		coded = Coded,
		visitdate = {Service date}
	)) ~> sink1
source3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		provider as string,
		revenue as integer,
		adjustments as integer,
		cash as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		provider = Provider,
		revenue = Charges,
		adjustments = Adjustments,
		cash = Payments
	)) ~> sink2
